 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כאר‎</span>] see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כור‎</span>. 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כוּר‎</span>] **verb** meaning dubious, perhaps ***bore***, or ***dig***, or ***hew*** ([[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Prol. 121</sup> compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***kâru***</u></abbr>, ***fell*** trees ([[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 324</sup>)) — only **Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כארו‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּארוּ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרוּ‎</span> [[Ps.22.17|Ps 22:17]] ([[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּאֲרִי‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרִי‎</span>) ***they have bored*** (***digged, hewn***) my hands and my feet (si vera lectio; compare [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Pe|Pe]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others; some, however, deriving from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כרה‎</span> in this sense); hence perhaps following. 

 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרָה‎</span> **verb** ==dig== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּרָא‎</span>, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhKAARAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAoABEAAAJZjI+py+0fgJRtAhitsbN2rGXXt4RQSInOZyJoSiocJ5PzJeLbHbf0EQPCbMGcK5Ug4lpC5IbBiupqTqhyN6UmtVjs1KnM9pbSL7ga9v687OMQCT+/MfS6oQAAOw=="> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIgAiAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAiACIAAAJgjI+py+0AnWSwrjiVpSD7s31TKEpkyXWoiZmNCrYsbFT0ycZ2jLYnPqJxesKLLHNMiZJKD9NYfEWbweVUc8VmEbIn8MW1ib/I8W7FQ+fU0u2KrD6zE/J5rT4X2+n7vqcAADs="> (with <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and especially <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]<sup>ii. 461</sup>); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhGgAVAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAaABUAAAJCjI+pa7DgWIJwVomo0vjwfHVNOIqgZZ6p9GGk6lJv0JJyW8L0hc/oGPEEG52XTba7GYfK5jAHdM56PobvGcOutp0CADs="> is ***be short, cut off*** (i.e. ***rounded off*** ?), Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIQAiAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAhACIAAAJijI+py+0PF5ixmkltxEDXLHUI52BhaJ5KOpIam3DiNze11N6eG4Al35NddDsfzPOj+WxLBvBHXDWdU2kU9RDSsk8odFmt5qxk5FDWfVFmV4vYfIYz2+Y0XCs/29X4vP+PVAAAOw=="> ***ball***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרֵי‎</span> ***heap*** [[BDB#Dalm|Dalm]]<sup>Gr. 109</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIwAWAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAjABYAAAJWjI+pywgNowFUPWkTvWfjsHld5ZBSyE2mmkKhtYKtG7Pa3OB292Fif6v9IiuUUBfkGGPDXMo0fJV80xI0Whs9lygtV8r6er9MkjEpvvWyjCYNCI/LMQUAOw=="> Mishna <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כרי‎</span> ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***karê***</u></abbr> large vessels for holding corn, etc., [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 353</sup>, compare ***kirû*** (dubious) [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>Tel Am. Vocab</sup>.; [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG 1887, 615</sup> conjectures ***be round*** as orig √ meaning, and compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhNgAiAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAA2ACIAAAKJjI+py+0PIwJgVYkf3Yrmb3GJCJbG1aHmGrLu6L1yLDNkc9fHlqe6TcMFf6UeMWMEqVhJiGe4asImF6hPY+1oMVnYsuX8BrpTbCRL3om92F7QnR7zxiee/c6mrlN3ex3P11fkEvO0d3RFJHVCdeQHJLKoFEendogodIkJtFmj2an3CfoIWmr6UQAAOw=="> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhKgAXAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAqABcAAAJtjI+py80AnZwJxgDepc1mrHgb9o3dZoqfcZmhhayHOrfy4t4sHJc65TrNJiIWxziUpH6a2tHJQTErvaNUyUNGodraSLYqxbg5D1SVgX25Xin6HQ47vmhSOsWuPoG/4B5nVvTHRzNoJWiYqOhQAAA7"> ***the leg is round***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרָה‎</span> [[2Chr.16.14|2Chr 16:14]]; [[Ps.7.16|Ps 7:16]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרִיתָ‎</span> [[Ps.40.7|Ps 40:7]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּרִיתִי‎</span> [[Gen.50.5|Gen 50:5]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרוּ‎</span> [[Jer.18.20|Jer 18:20]] + 3 t.; sf <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרוּהָ‎</span> [[Num.21.18|Num 21:18]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכְרֶה‎</span> [[Exod.21.33|Exod 21:33]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּכְרוּ‎</span> [[Gen.26.25|Gen 26:25]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּרֶה‎</span> [[Prov.16.27|Prov 16:27]]; [[Prov.26.27|Prov 26:27]] — ***dig*** a grave, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶבֶר‎</span> [[Gen.50.5|Gen 50:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare [[2Chr.16.14|2Chr 16:14]] a well, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאֵר‎</span> [[Gen.26.25|Gen 26:25]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.21.18|Num 21:18]] (song in [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]); a pit, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺר‎</span> [[Exod.21.33|Exod 21:33]] figurative of plotting against others [[Ps.7.16|Ps 7:16]] so followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּחָה‎</span> [[Jer.18.20|Jer 18:20]]; [[Jer.18.22|Jer 18:22]], followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁיחָה‎</span> [[Jer.57.7|Jer 57:7]]; [[Jer.119.85|Jer 119:85]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחַת‎</span> [[Prov.26.27|Prov 26:27]] hence <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּרֶה רָעָה‎</span> [[Prov.16.27|Prov 16:27]] ***one digging a calamity***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָזְנַיִם כ‎</span> [[Ps.40.7|Ps 40:7]] ears ***hast thou dug*** (with allusion to the cavity of the ear) ***for me***, thou hast given me the means of hearing and obeying thy will. — On [[Ps.22.17|Ps 22:17]] verse. II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוּר‎</span>. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד יִכָּרֶה שַׁהַּת‎</span> [[Ps.94.13|Ps 94:13]] ***until the pit be digged*** for the wicked, figurative of judgment.
